attributes.review: This app gives me chills this president should not have and app because the racist and hurtful things he had said he should be ashamed of himself I don’t know how people can still thinks he’s amazing after things he’s done he hasn’t helped anything or anyone he’s just made it  worse it’s sickening to even have a thought that this is our president #BLACKLIVESMATTER #HISPANICLIVESMATTER thanks bye
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I honestly wish I could give it zero stars! am SO disappointed in this app! I was so excited to learn about my president. But it kept making my phone glitch! Now I have to get a new software update which costs money. I just wanted to learn and now I have to fix my phone😖 I just want people to not break their phones like I did with this app😔
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY A HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: He he doesn’t support the Black Lives Matter he’s trying to delete TickTock which is making kids not having fun and living the life you only have one life to live and who who wants a president that doesn’t care about black lives I know I don’t so please read this one star so we can get our freedom and TikTok and black lives matter
attributes.title: Support

attributes.review: I was about to open my app and was ready to learn about my President. When all of a sudden my phone glitched because of the app and it turned off. I was so scared and thought it was broken because it didn’t want to turn on anymore. That’s why I think u shouldn’t download it your phone can get damaged and possibly not work ever again.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: I wanted to try to support my president by downloading this app. But I went into the app and the screen is just black. And then the app closed. So I open it a couple times again and then, finally I see the main page. It was very underwhelming, the app crashes and it’s not very useful. Honestly I’m done with Trump altogether #settleforbiden
attributes.title: This doesn’t work

attributes.review: When I got this app I was under the impression, As a trump follower of the lower IQ status and given into account my hillbilly ways, this app was not near racist enough. I thought Trump was for “Preserving our History” and I didn’t see not one thing about where too meet up for cross burnings or even how to Host a cross burning. I did not enjoy this libtard app. Have a good day. Sieg heil👋🏻
attributes.title: Not what I expected

attributes.review: I got this app to help Trump but overall could find no reason to keep the app any longer. It kept send me messages and hacking my phone. And quite frankly now I realize that this isn’t the man I want  my life to be in the hands of. Considering how well he’s doing with COVID-19, black lives matter movement, and basically everything else. Sad.
attributes.title: Hope is gone

attributes.review: My phone has been glitching ever sense I got this app. It has been telling me things and has been showing my criminal activity that the app creator has been doing like showing kids porn and having sexual intercouse and it’s inappropriate for the appple phone. I had to go to the appple store just for my phone to work again. 😐
attributes.title: Porn and phone glitching

attributes.review: Trump is not a good person, first of all he is posing a huge risk for everyone in america’s personally safety and health. he has no regard for science and can’t put aside his desire to have a strong economy in order to help the whole world get rid of the COVID-19 threat. He is pushing to reopen school which will only lead to millions of more cases in america where we already have leading cases in the world.
attributes.title: threat to public safety

attributes.review: I was chilling on the couch and I decided, ‘I’m really hungry, I want a orange” i then saw this app that was brought down from the pits of hell and I thought ‘this must be the thing to cure my hunger!’ I downloaded it to fill my regeneration bar because I was at half a heart, when it didn’t 🤕😾🙀😿 me just wanted to eat and y’all gave me sourness instead. I just wanted to eat some oranges.
attributes.title: I was just hungry 😿
